name: Enquire Solutions
tag_list: crm, cloud, senior, community, saas, sales
overview:
Enquire Solutions designs and implements customized sales call centers and cloud technology exclusively for the senior living industry. Enquire’s cloud-based Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software, EnquireLEADS™ securely categorizes all sales data so that activity can be easily assigned, tracked and completed.

Our solutions deliver a prompt and cost-effective way of managing a community’s leads. By partnering with Enquire Solutions, communities will achieve high contact and conversion rates as well as develop an exceptional reputation as an industry leader in customer service. Enquire Solutions’ knowledgeable community advisors, efficient processes and cutting-edge technology complement a community’s in-house staff. Our robust cloud-based Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software, EnquireLEADS™ was designed exclusively for senior living communities and securely categorizes all sales data so that tasks can be easily assigned, tracked and completed. Clients can access real-time customizable reports to view key performance metrics. Our services are tailored to fit each community’s needs and can be integrated with current systems.

Our cost effective approach allows communities to streamline the admissions process and free up in-house resources. This turnkey model offers communities higher conversion and occupancy rates by delivering immediate response to inquiries, transparent data and knowledgeable service. Our dedicated contact center, technology platform and highly-trained customer service associates make us an elite business process outsourcer for senior living communities.
